Package serverSide.objects

Class AssaultParty

java.lang.Object
serverSide.objects.AssaultParty
All Implemented Interfaces:
AssaultPartyInterface, Remote
public class AssaultParty extends Object implements AssaultPartyInterface
Assault Party. Is implemented as an implicit monitor. All public methods are executed in mutual exclusion. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.
